Package sailpoint.api

Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.api.RequestManager
  • public class RequestManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class providing an API for managing the request processor and submitting asynchronous requests.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      • startProcessor

                    throws GeneralException

      • suspendProcessor

        public void suspendProcessor()
                      throws GeneralException
        Suspend the request processor service.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • wakeProcessor

        public void wakeProcessor()
        Break the request processor thread out of its sleep so it can process requests earlier. Convenient for the unit tests.

      • pingProcessor

        public boolean pingProcessor()
        Return true if the request processor is alive and responsive.

      • addRequest

        public void addRequest​(Request request)
                throws GeneralException
        Submit a request for processing.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • addRequestNoCommit

        public void addRequestNoCommit​(Request request)
                        throws GeneralException
        Submit a request for processing but do not commit the transaction. This is used in special cases where transaction locks are being held on other objects that cannot be released while events are being scheduled.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • scheduleRequest

      • getRequestProcessor

        public sailpoint.request.RequestProcessor getRequestProcessor()
        Return the RequestProcessor object that controls the processing thread and provides a few utility methods. This is a singleton managed by the RequestService. Public so HeartbeatService can use it but most places should not.

      • terminatePartitionedTask

        public void terminatePartitionedTask​(TaskResult res)
                              throws GeneralException
        Terminate a partitioned task that might be running on several machines.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • terminatePartitionThreads

        public void terminatePartitionThreads​(TaskResult res)
                               throws GeneralException
        Terminate all RequestHandler threads for a partitioned task running on this machine.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

               throws GeneralException
        Terminate a RequestHandler thread running on this machine.
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • resetRequests

        public void resetRequests​(java.lang.String host)
                   throws GeneralException
        Tell the RequestProcessor a host has gone down. Intended only for the HeartbeatService.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
